goal.en: On successful completion of this course, students will be able to 1. greet people, make small talks, open/close a conversation, and ask for clarification; 2. understand and respond to daily conversations in coherent manner. 3. and guess the meaning of unfamiliar language items, listen for the gist, take notes and give appropriate responses. 4. create presentation outlines."
goal.ch: 修完本課程，學生應能 1. 運用基本英語會話技巧； 2. 理解日常生活中對話內容，並能清楚地表達自己的意見； 3. 從較難的對話內容猜想並推論大意，作筆記，並作出適當的回應； 4. 具備簡報大綱的編輯製作能力。

content.en:
While learners study a language, they are expected to be able to learn the most with the awareness of their learning autonomy and the willingness to express themselves actively in learning processes. Thus, based on that, this class will help students to improve skills necessary for better successful English communication, listening and speaking, through the use of English as the medium of instruction, the use of DVD / CD, and other classroom interactive activities. To train their ears to understand spoken English more easily, and have oral practices to increase spoken fluency. In order to master English as a tool of verbal communication, emphasis will also be included on developing native-like vocabulary (idioms), speech patters, and pronunciation.
Course Aim:
(1) To practice and improve speaking, listening and reading higher level English dealing with more mature or controversial subjects.
(2) To assistant students with fluency English communication skills to fit in this multi-cultural world, which may help them to have better plans for their both foreign and domestic further study.
content.ch: 透過欣賞英文電影與影集來幫助學生了解並熟悉日常英文用語，並加強對英文生字之用法練習。有了這樣的學習環境和機會，學生能更完整詳盡的了解英語文；學生更因此補足了課堂學習和實際運用之間的大鴻溝。修習完此課程之後，學生的英文聽、說甚至閱讀的能力都會提升，而且可以流暢的地表達每天生活必用英文會話。
